title: Help me with new chests
body:
How do i get the new Snowdown chests. Are they only avaiable with rp or can they drop if i get an s- or higher in normals and poroking event?
Please answer this. i really wanna know

replies.body: The snowdown chests are available through the store, and do not drop in-game.  Receiving a mastery chest for an S grade will drop a normal hextech chest, as will using a gemstone to fuse a chest.  Hope that helps clear things up!
